body: Bring in your deciphering skills and crack simple clues to win the race and reach the final destination. Beware the clues are simple but getting to them are not if you fail with your strategy. All you need to do is pick up the clues in the right way and decrypt them to get to the final destination before others do. Don't miss out to take this Road to Glory ! Come in teams of 4 for the main round.
title: Auto-Crypt

body: 'There's a pot of gold, In NIT's backyard as I'm told, So grab your eyepatch and hook, There's treasure waiting-come help us look!' Team Aavishkar is here with it's offline treasure hunt event - REChase. With exciting clues, riddles and puzzles scattered  across our beautiful campus, REChase is set to take you on a roller coaster ride that will surely dazzle your mind. Filled with unique surprises and unexpected twists, this hunt for the final treasure is going to be more exciting and thrilling than ever. So, come with your crew and claim your treasure!
title: Rechase

body: Inspiration strikes best when you are surrounded by real life examples of what hard work can truly result in.  This Aarohan, team Aavishkar presents Startup Expo, a one of a kind initiative to connect budding startups with timely aid to help them grow. If you are looking for a perfect stage to pitch your idea,  look no further.  Startup Expo is your chance.  Come let's give your journey as an entrepreneur the wings it require.
title: StartUp Expo

body: Your long wait to customise your own bot comes to an end here . Choose your weapons and your defenses smartly else you will have to pay your price with your life! This Aarohan 2020 play Battlebots and create your dream bot online to compete against others. "Fight with your fantasy bot"
title: BattleBots

body: Think, create & discover Do you want to venture new things?Are you willing to to take a step in the future of advanced robotics? Then join the journey with Consilio, an  exhilarating event where your team needs to design a walking robot and compete with other bots.  Participate now and explore the world of robotics.
title: Consilio

body: Go far with construct! sound technical interest with bucket full of creativity and problem solving ability, we welcome all the robo freaks to the domain where team spirit and technical capabilities pave path to the final finish. We introduce all the Inquisitive minds to the autonomous robotics event AUTO SOLVERIA. Participate in teams of 3-4 and guide your bots through the hurdles of time and checkpoints .So gear up and start tuned as we release our problem statement soon.
title: Auto Solviera

body: 'Truth can only be found in one place:The Code'. For all the tech geeks and coding enthusiasts, Team Aavishar presents before you CodeCracker, an online coding contest, in Aarohan 2020. CodeCracker shall be hosted on a Judge designed by the members of the Organizing committee themselves . This two hour marathon is set to witness a battle between the best minds across the world. Be ready to prove yourself among those and earn the bragging rights !
title: Code Cracker

body: “The thing about football - the important thing about football- is that it is not just about football.”  This Aarohan, we give you a chance to live the game you all love with Fantasy Football. It will be conducted over two rounds: Round 1 will be the prelims. It will a pen and paper based football quiz. The second round will be a auction where teams need to bid for the players and create a dream team. The team with the best rating wins the contest. Be there for this extravaganza !
title: Fantasy Football

body: One of Eastern India’s largest techno-management fests Aarohan aims to provide a pedestal for students to compete according to global standards. Team Aavishkar thereby brings to you Incanity, an ACM ICPC style Onsite coding contest, this Aarohan. Incanity shall provide a unique opportunity for participants to experience how a global programming competition works and also lets you prove yourself to be the best in this battle of wits and bits.
title: Incanity

body: We are well aware of how good it feels when you point out someone else’s mistake and then solve them. This Aarohan, experience this eternal satisfaction like never before, as Team Aavishkar brings to you ‘Twin Attack’, a fun debugging contest. Spread over multiple levels, this event has a plethora of games to add to the code snippets you need to debug. This could turn out to be a race against all odds to be the very best. We make the mistakes, all you need to do is to solve them ! Be there
title: Twin Attack

body: Get in. Get out. Easy right? It's time to showcase your solving power! Race against the clock to reveal what waiting for you at the end of the Maze. Exhibit your  problem-solving skills to win the game. So Play. Compete. Win.
title: Mazemerize

body: Get yourself in gear as this AAROHAN 2020, organized by Team Aavishkar is here with the annual science exhibition,'TechMela' and yes, we are inviting entries. So, let your innovation soar high and present your projects without any participation fees and get the recognition you deserve! For registration fill-up the form
title: TechMela

body: This is an event where the participant is required to market a product/service/commodity. This event brings out the creativity and pleasing skills of the contestants and ultimately the money and creativity matter and gives away a winner.
title: Selldom

body: When the stakes are high and money is everything, each second becomes crucial. This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar brings before you a complete new event "Sweepstake" which will keep you on your toes the entirety of the way, keeping you guessing and dealing. Devise your game plan because one correct guess can turn the tables.
title: Sweepstake

body: A business plan is a formal written document containing business goals, the methods on how these goals can be attained, and the time frame within which these goals need to be achieved. It also describes the nature of the business, background information on the organization, the organization's financial projections, and the strategies it intends to implement to achieve the stated targets. In its entirety, this document serves as a road map that provides direction to the business. So the B-Plan Competition invites all the budding entrepreneurs to pitch their idea and even get incubation.
title: B-Plan

body: The Case Study competition, where students will be given a problem situation related to fields like management, business, technology etc, enhances the ability of the participants to think strategically and critically about every aspect possible to arrive at the final solution. The event gives the students an experience to tackle real life problems and sharpens their problem-solving skills.
title: Case Study Competition

body: This is the event which makes you renovate the things beyond the capacity of your mind.This will be a prelim + 2 round event, where the participants will be enjoying the fun events as well as face technical obstructions in order win the event.
title: Conjecture

body: Bidweiser is an fun and skill development event organised by Team Aavishkar NIT DURGAPUR which will be held during AAROHAN , the annual techno management fest of NIT Durgapur which is the second largest fest in the eastern India .In this event , the students will be tested on their management , business and bidding skills and they would have to think strategically and critically to complete their tender.
title: Bidwieser

body: If the weight of formulating simple answers has ever bogged you down, this is your chance to unleash the chaotic creativity within you. Design domino effects and demonstrate the most complex solution to solve a simple problem. First round will be prelims. In the second-round qualified teams have to simply open a door and ring the burglar alarm through a series of complex mechanical tasks.
title: Contraptions

body: Research paper presentation event First round will be prelims. In the second-round qualified teams have to simply open a door and ring the burglar alarm through a series of complex mechanical tasks.
title: Abhivyakti

body: Built on the concept of "gift economics", Ripple Effect in association with Hope Foundation is based on the idea of gifting. In this cafe we believe in generosity, hospitality, and serving our guests, wherein there are no predetermined price tags associated, one pays according to their wish.
title: Ripple Effect

body: It is a buisness oriented event, real life situations will be given and teams have to use their buisness skills and available resources to earn maximum profit.
title: Be a Billionaire

body: This Aarohan, team Aavishkar presents Journo Detective, an online murder mystery. The event requires participants to move to checkpoints and unlock clues which help them develop a storyline. The last checkpoint is where you need to enter the name of the killer with the adequate reasons. Prove yourself to be the best in this race to capture the criminal at the earliest.
title: Journo Detective

body: Make the strongest possible bridge of appropriate length and height to sustain the maximum load in minimum time.
title: Invictus Civil

body: It consists of prelims based upon general understanding of chemical universe.The teams proceeding towards further round will have to apply their knowledge to build a working model.
title: Invictus Chemical

body: A competitive event. Teams have to defend their base from ground and air attacks. Team which is successfully able to defend most parts of it's base wins.
title: Invictus Mechanical

body: Believe Brain neurons fire at lightening speeds? Fret not, we are all set to test all your electrifying creativity skills. Invictus electrical: event involves designing a suitable electrical circuit to find the solution for a given problem statement. Gear up!
title: Invictus Electrical

body: The teams are required to make a rocket out of the materials mentioned.It will be a time bounded round .They will be shown the youtube video once. Further if they want to see the video again they have to solve a riddle and only one team member can go and watch the video. Next is the execution of the model. Each team will have to launch their rockets turnwise.
title: Rocket It

body: Hardware Edition: Ever felt the desire to build something innovative? Do you want to showcase your out of the world products to the world? Your wait has come to an end with the OnSpot hackathon, a 36-hour hackathon as part of Aarohan. Prizes and goodies are on the store and to top it all we have DRDO summer internship/training for the best teams. All you need to do is pair up in teams of 2 and brainstorm an innovative solution to any problem related to domains provided.
title: On Spot Hackathon

body: A competitive and interview based Game which will make sure to squeeze everything out of your mind. Everything shall be evaluated, from Originality to Presentation, from Relevance to Coherence. So are you ready to get “Recruited”?
title: Game of Recruitment

body: Aarohan 2020, organised by Team Aaviskar, NIT Durgapur presents before you, the offical Software Hackathon HACKOVERFLOW 3.0, an opportunity to tailor innovation with the fabric of technology and a chance to implement all that you have learnt so far to make something you can be proud of ! The winners of this Hackathon also get an exclusive opportunity to intern with Facebook Developer's Group, India in addition to other exciting prizes. All the rules and regulations regarding the event will be provided in the registration portal.
title: Hackoverflow 3.0

body: The autonomous bot of the participating team (of not more than 4 members) must be able to cover the tracks given in the problem statement following the given instructions, in minimum possible time.The event has 2 rounds (preliminary and final).The top five teams of the preliminary round shall qualify for the final round. Teams securing first, second, and third positions will be provided with certificates and exciting prizes.
title: Explorateur

body: Decathlon is the annual coding competition of NIT Durgapur organized by Team Aavishkar as part of the annual techno-management fest Aarohan. It consists of a number of coding questions to be solved in a given time frame. Each question contains test cases, passing maximum no. of test cases grants maximum points, and the standing is decided accordingly. The event is open to participants from all over India.
title: Decathlon

body: The first round will be a pen/paper round.The second round will be a task to make the longest chain of popsicles.The third round will be: Each team will be given a model of an empty room (2 walls and floor) made using thermocol. They have to use the given materials to make the most creative room by making different elements of a room.
title: Maidan e Creative

body: Inquest is an online treasure hunt which starts one day prior to Aarohan and spans for about 24 hrs. The person who cracks the maximum number of questions is declared as the winner.
title: Inquest

body: 'Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark' Design a manually-controlled robot having strong gripping hand mechanisms to complete this exciting course while being on the clock. Put your robot-making and motor skills to the ultimate test through this contest. Some notorious terrorists have hidden bombs in your college and plan to create havoc and destroy everything to dust. Team Aavishkar entrusts you with the finding and diffusion of these bombs for good. You have to traverse along the long and windy road to each of the bombs and prevent them from burning the whole place down to ash while avoiding the set obstacles.
title: Nuke Clear

body: 'Beyond all limits' Design a manually controlled robot having a hook and strong gripping mechanism and take it to the epic battlefield. Compete against others and test your skills in the fire of passion and emerge as the champion. A game of obstacles, distorted paths, hurdles and so many twists in between, come in teams of four and ride as fast and as sharp as possible to score more and win the race.
title: Street Fury

body: This Aarohan, face the best event for gearheads and automaniacs as we bring you Transmission.Show up your automobile and mechanical skills as we bring you a plethora of options to showcase them. Make gear trains transmitting the fastest motion, and get to reassemble and use a machine, with your newfound knowledge, Provided you solve the questions for the parts, of course. So, are you ready to get your hands messy on some cycle grease?
title: Transmission

body: As Yoda might say “ The source strong within you is? ” Put on your White Hats, keep your laptops charged and set foot on the Cyber Grounds. Team Aavishkar brings You a mission : “Capture the Flag should you choose to accept it? “, this Aarohan. Capture the Flag lets you dive deep into the world of technology, where often obscure contexts lead you to the flag. At the end of the day, all you need to do is follow this enigmatic trail. At the end of it all lay the coveted top spot, which ensures numerous cash prizes and awards.
title: Capture The Flag

body: 'Experience the future, in the present' Want to be a business tycoon? Want to know how much you can face the challenges? It's the real-time to showcase your potential of having a eureka moment. Now it's a historical chance to bridge the gap between you and the business world. Conquesto brings to you a chance to discover the business tycoon in you.
title: Conquesto

body: Do you want to embark on the journey to the world of circuits? Does your team has what it takes to come out on top? Join the journey with Electra, a captivating event where your team needs to design some simple circuits and show your basic electrical skills. Participate now and explore the world of circuits.
title: Electra

body: Are you confident enough to create your own mechanism? The smarter the mechanism, the better edge you'll have. Flow-enigma brings you a chance to make your own hydraulic pushing mechanism and compete.So do participate and win exciting prizes!
title: Flow-Enigma

body: Something' outta "Nothing" It is time you use your brain to make the best out of waste! Junkyard presents you a platform to show your creativity and basic science knowledge by making something useful out of the scraps and battle with other teams in this war of junk. So participate and win exciting prizes by making something out of nothing!!
title: Junkyard

body: Get them or get out! As time passes by, get the adventurer in you awakened as you stealthily conquer your rivals' yards.Come in groups of three, place your shells and blow 'em up before they get you in an amazing skill-show of design and control! Royal League, the manual robotics event of Aarohan 2020 will test your problem solving skills and reflexes!
title: Royal League

body: Do you consider yourself a stock market expert! Well here is your chance to prove it. See what you have got with our online stock exchange stimulation event Freemex. It is a stock exchange game with real time data built using different open source technologies. Freemex is an online trading game which allows you to buy and sell stocks at your convenience and at the current market price. The player at the end with highest total stocks and cash wins the game
title: Freemex

body: With advanced navigation and Maps at your fingertips, there's hardly any chance of you going astray! This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar challenges you to find a way out of it's Digital Fortress! Prove your googling skills to solve clues and unlock maps which will take you one turn ahead on your way out! Do you have it in you to breach the impregnable? The odds will be stacked against you and time running out! Well, unleash the arsenal of your wits and embark on this enigmatic journey. Digital Fortress requires you to go through the levels different set of questions whose hints are included in the locations on the map. The locations are unlocked when you answer clue questions correctly. The fastest to the top conquers the fortress !
title: Digital Fortress

body: Get your showels and flashlights ready as you go for the gold! This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar brings you Online Treasure Hunt. Treasure Hunt and Online? Yes you read it right, now take part in this amazing Treasure Hunt with all the comfort of your room! OTH aims to test one’s reasoning and progressive thinking in this world full of treasures through our quizzing web app. Unearth the valuables first to grab all the honours. Exciting prizes await!!
title: Online Treasure Hunt

body: This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar presents ‘Behind the Scenes’ , an event where you decrypt the incomprehensive and indulge in a war of wits to emerge supreme. Be there in this mind boggling extravaganza, fighting against the odds of time and sneaking under the glare of enemies ready to pounce on to you. You are required to come in teams of 3 . The prelims will be a pen and paper round after which the teams that qualify shall compete for supremacy behind the scenes.
title: Behind The Scenes

body: Do you think you can play with huge numbers? Well, this Aarohan, show us that you have that perfect synergy of quick and logical thinking and show us why you are the big brain in town. Mindsweepers is a reasoning and aptitude questions contest based on Project Euler, combining logic and mathematical concepts with fun and frolic! Participate in the preliminary round brought to you by Team Aavishkar, with your thinking caps on, because the top 8 participants will move a step closer to ultimate glory. NO CODING SKILLS REQUIRED. Prelims from 5th February 2020, 10:00 PM.
title: MindSweepers

body: " more you know, the more you know you don't know." Games, tricks and puzzles help team building, motivation, and warm up any gathering. This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar presents Perplexity which brings to you a brainstorm in the form of mind boggling and cryptic riddles with a touch of strategic bidding to offer you a thrilling event. Bring out the Sherlock in you and decrypt riddles to grab Super Exciting Prizes!
title: Perplexity

body: Step into the shoes of the ‘high functioning sociopath' and dig out the sleuth hound in you for the ‘Game is on'! This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar brings to you the chance to explore the analyst side of you with the enthralling event ‘Call out Sherlock’! Come in teams of three to work out your strategist mind and judgmental instincts, explore intriguing mystery locations, decipher clues and help unveil the mystery.
title: Call out Sherlock

body: Niche your carve to the zenith of victory as it's the night to "conquer" and feel invincible. This is an event, where the winning teams strive to defeat their rivals and prove their mettle in the quintessential challenge requiring the perfect balance of their teamwork, coordination and speed. This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar unveils Clash Of Titans, an event where you “Power and Match. If you spike you clash”.
title: Clash of Titans

body: Haven’t you been intrigued watch Tony Stark build a whole suit of armour with a handful of scrapes in a cave? Team Aavishkar unveils the event ‘Constructo’ where you get to try your hand at making technical prototypes with a handful of materials. Showcase your ingenuity of idea and technical prowess and get a chance to win exciting prizes.
title: Constructo

body: Rubik’s Cube! The name is mighty enough to draw everyone’s attention, right? This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar is here with Cuborita, a manifestation of the classic Rubik's Cube puzzle in a twisted fashion. Packed in a series of enthralling activities involving aptitude, Cuborita has something for everyone. Those out there who love to put their wits and creative thinking to the limit, be present in teams of three for a whale of time.
title: Cuborita

body: 'Look at the usual thing with unusual eyes.' - Vico Magistretti. And this has been one of the driving principles for our work at Art Gallery. So each year during Aarohan, we create a small space to showcase our work apart from the posters and other fest graphics. In this fast paced techfest of NIT Durgapur, Team Aavishkar is a juxtaposition with its calm and serene atmosphere. Come and have look at our photo exhibition and get a chance to immerse in the plethora of memories from the previous Aarohans. So do visit us from 9th Feb to 10th Feb anytime you feel like.
title: Art Gallery

body: Ronaldo or Messi? Football is love but have you ever imagined football on a paper with a set of well defined rules? Exciting isn’t it? For all football fans Team Aavishkar presents Darwinia to be held during this Aarohan. Lots of Fun with a blend of logic and strategy. Sounds interesting right? Make every move smartly and win some amazing prizes.
title: Darwinia

body: Ever dreamt of building your own house? Remember there are people spying on you, with all their weapons aimed to demolish your house of dreams. This Aarohan, get ready with your troop, prove your logical skills, acquire your assets and remember ‘Don’t let the house down!. Participate in teams of three.
title: House of Cups

body: This Aarohan, unleash the Mathemagician in you for we bring to you the perfect amalgamation of strategic board games and old school Maths! Gather your team, expand your territory and emerge together as the strongest force in this exhilarating event Matrix! "May the numbers be with you!"
title: Matrix

body: Secret codes have long fascinated people. Are you the one who loves to crack ciphers, unravel secret codes and immerse yourself in the captivating world of cryptology? This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar is here with its very own Delphic event, Kryptic. Contestants are required to follow a trail of encrypted messages, decode it and claw their way to the top. Come and participate in teams of 3 to decipher the enigmatic.
title: Kryptic

body: Silence is never vacuous, it’s full of answers. Puzzled, right? Remember playing dumb charades in school? We are here with a new version of it. This Aarohan, Team Aavishkar presents you TECH CHARADES, to relive your golden days of childhood with a technical twist. Participate in teams of three/four, decode the silence and win exciting prizes.
title: Tech Charades

body: All you need is a seat belt for your brain as Team Aavishkar brings you Explicate in Aarohan 2020, an event where through a series of mind boggling questions and riddles, we test your knowledge of trending technologies and Open Source. The questions are an amalgamation of the secrets of Open Source and some fun elements which shall take you through a topsy turvy ride of fierce competition and unlimited frenziness.
title: Explicate

body: Technology is evolving with each passing day and so is the demand for those acquainted with these new age skills. If you want to learn and update yourself with the most advanced technologies of this era and put the gained knowledge to practical use, do not think for a second time and be a part of Aarohan'20 as Team Aavishkar, NIT Durgapur brings to you 4 fascinating workshops on newly developed technologies. The details and their links are given as follows:
title: Machine Learning

body: Ever dreamt of leading a life as interesting as Mr. Robot's and diving deep into the world of hacking passwords, locations or software that could really help you tackle webpage viruses or maybe even infest your best friend’s machine with one of those?  Well, the dream is not far away. This time around Aarohan, organised by Team Aavishkar NIT Durgapur, brings to you the Ethical Hacking Workshop. Waste no time and go on register for the workshop to win certificates powered by Microsoft, Adobe, HP and Autodesk as limited seats remain.
title: Ethical Hacking

body: Gone are the days when Raspberry pi reminded you of dessert and Arduinos were considered just another fad. Installing code on those advanced microprocessor chips and using it to run the self-made machine is making quite a buzz these days. What if we told you that you could do all of this, and learn how to make advanced projects as well. This Aarohan, organised by Team Aavishkar, NIT Durgapur, we bring to you the IoT WORKSHOP. So go on, grab your spot and receive certificates powered by Microsoft, HP, Adobe and Autodesk!
title: IOT Workshop

body: “You can’t always get what you want”, well what if we told you that you can get exactly what you want and we can help you with designing and creating it? This Aarohan, organised by Team Aavishkar, NIT Durgapur, brings to you the 3D Printing Workshop. Don’t miss out on the chance to operate a 3D printer and create your own 3D designs. Certificates powered by Microsoft, Adobe, HP and Autodesk to be won! Hurry up and register!
title: 3D Printing

body: Introducing Competitive Programming Workshop by CodeChef certified volunteers, for all the aspiring programmers who want to build a strong foundation in Data Structure and Algorithms. It will be a beginner level workshop, open to students from any background who have a passion to learn programming. This workshop can be attended by students of NIT Durgapur or other colleges.
title: Competitive Coding

body: A multitude of spectators of life's poise, making exquisite decisions in a flash, Team STROKES, heartily welcomes you to Kalakriti, the 6th Edition of the annual art and photography exhibition, and urges you to indulge in the pleasure of believing in graceful lies. Come, Experience the myriad of influences which we dare to call Inspiration, without any guilt.
title: Kalakriti

body: Musical Performance by the renowned Alvin Rozario and his band on 9th of February 2020 at Lords Arena. See you at'Aarohan Nite with Alvin Rozario'
title: Aarohan Nite

body: Ever dreamt of designing, manufacturing and racing an All Terrain Vehicle !!!!! We TEAM NIT DURGAPUR OFF ROAD SPORTS RACING taken this challenge.This year we represented NIT DURGAPUR at national level competition  called SAE-BAJA 2020. Every auto inthusiasts should come in AAROHAN'20  organised by team Aavishkar, to learn and interact with the BAJA team in the main arena.
title: BAJA

body: What if you get a chance to forget everything and live a fever pitched night packed with adrenaline? Excited right? And why shouldn't you be because Aarohan 2020 organized by Team Aavishkar presents you the Overnight Gaming on 8th of February. So get ready with your controllers and clattering keyboards excelling passes and dribbles. Reload your guns and get into the assault mode because every bullet counts!
title: Overnight Gaming

body: We reveal to you our first speaker, Mr. Srinivas Chamarthy ! Managing Director of CYME Automation Systems Pvt Ltd. He is alumni of University College of Engineering Osmania who is well known for his ‘A Journey to Realize SELF’. His weapon is to identify, inspire and inculcate the young minds of the nation towards his mission with thought process 'Think India, Work India, Make In India, Grow India'.
title: Ignitia

body: From an author to a TEDx speaker, our first speaker 's profile spans many domains. With 15 years of teaching high speed mental maths through television programs, DVDs, talks and books, he was truly named as one of India 's Top Young Visionaries. We reveal to you our first speaker: Gaurav Tekriwal. Catch him here live in Inspiratie on 8th February and get a chance to interact with him and be truly inspired!
title: Inspiratie
